title: Diagrammatization: Rationalizing with diagrammatic AI explanations for abductive-deductive reasoning on hypotheses. (arXiv:2302.01241v2 [cs.AI] UPDATED)
abstract: Many visualizations have been developed for explainable AI (XAI), but they often require further reasoning by users to interpret. We argue that XAI should support diagrammatic and abductive reasoning for the AI to perform hypothesis generation and evaluation to reduce the interpretability gap. We propose Diagrammatization to i) perform Peircean abductive-deductive reasoning, ii) follow domain conventions, and iii) explain with diagrams visually or verbally. We implemented DiagramNet for a clinical application to predict cardiac diagnoses from heart auscultation, and explain with shape-based murmur diagrams. In modeling studies, we found that DiagramNet not only provides faithful murmur shape explanations, but also has better prediction performance than baseline models. translated_title: 图解化：利用图解型AI解释对假设性演绎推理的理性化
translated_abstract: 许多可解释的人工智能（XAI）可视化工具已经被开发出来，但它们通常需要用户进一步推理来解释。我们认为，XAI应该支持图解型和假设性推理，以便AI能够进行假设生成和评估，从而减少可解释性差距。我们提出了图解化方法，以i)进行Peircean推导-演绎推理，ii)遵循领域惯例，和iii)用图示或语言进行解释。我们在临床应用领域实现了DiagramNet，以预测心脏听诊中的心脏诊断，并用基于形状的杂音图解进行解释。在建模研究中，我们发现DiagramNet不仅提供了忠实的杂音形状解释，而且比基线模型具有更好的预测性能。我们进一步通过医学生的定性用户研究展示了图解型解释的可理解性和可信度，并表明在临床相关的情况下，图解式解释比其他方式更受推崇。
tldr: 本文提出了一种图解化的方法，以支持可解释的人工智能，通过图解型和假设性推理，缩小可解释性差距。通过临床应用研究和建模研究，我们发现DiagramNet不仅能提供忠实的杂音形状解释，还具有较好的预测性能，而且图解型解释在临床相关的情况下更受推崇。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a method called Diagrammatization to support explainable AI through diagrammatic and abductive reasoning, reducing the interpretability gap. Through clinical and modeling studies, DiagramNet is shown to provide faithful explanations and better prediction performance for cardiac diagnoses, and diagrammatic explanations are preferred in clinically-relevant situations.
